plan.goal: Enable direct chat with CJ from dashboard
plan.next: Create backend proxy, then wire up real-time messaging
plan.why: Jason wants to chat directly from dashboard instead of switching to Telegram. Fills empty space and adds major functionality.

thinking: Need: (1) Chat UI with message history and input, (2) Backend server to proxy messages to Clawdbot, (3) Polling or WebSocket for real-time responses. Starting with UI first.
